article_text: South Florida hospitals earned middling results in a new federal rating system that scores hospitals on a five-star scale based on patient satisfaction. Only one earned five stars. Two scored one star.

article_metadata.news-keywords: CMS, Centers for Medicare and Medicaid, hospital star ratings, Hospital Compare, Baptist Health System, Jackson Memorial Hospital, Mariner's Hospital, Homestead Hospital, Fisherman's Hospital, North Shore Medical Center

article_summary:
South Florida hospitals earned middling results in a new federal rating system that scores hospitals on a five-star scale based on patient satisfaction.
Two scored one star.
Only one earned five stars.
